title: Player Attack S03E22 720p HDTV h264-Berg
description:
We're back! After a couple of weeks' break, we're jumping right back into gaming goodness with an indepth look into the Next Big Thing to sweep the industry. That's right, we're focussing on virtual reality (and augmented reality), as Jonny Robot goes hands-on with both the Microsoft Hololens and Sony's Project Morpheus, as well as trying out a couple of nifty peripherals.

Whether you want to use your hands, your feet, or just your eyes for gaming, there should be a modern gadget for you, so tune in to find out which one it is!

(...plus, of course, we have all the latest gaming news as well - this is Player Attack!)


Read more from Player Attack: http://www.playerattack.com/news/2015/07/30/whats-on-player-attack-tv-friday-july-31/#ixzz3hcDq9tYu
